description: Let’s go one step at a time. Wait for me before moving on.
prefill: Let’s go one step at a time. Wait for me before moving on.

description: Only give me step 1. Don’t move to step 2 unless I say so.
prefill: Only give me step 1. Don’t move to step 2 unless I say so.

description: Help me think through this — don’t solve it all at once.
prefill: Help me think through this — don’t solve it all at once.

description:
Break this into manageable parts. Let’s work on just the first
  one.
prefill:
Break this into manageable parts. Let’s work on just the first
  one.

description:
Don’t write long replies. Keep it to one actionable thought at
  a time.
prefill:
Don’t write long replies. Keep it to one actionable thought at
  a time.

description: Only reply with ‘okay’ until I ask you for something specific.
prefill: Only reply with ‘okay’ until I ask you for something specific.

description:
Ask me one question at a time to clarify my goal before
  jumping in.
prefill:
Ask me one question at a time to clarify my goal before
  jumping in.

description: Pause and wait for my confirmation after each step.
prefill: Pause and wait for my confirmation after each step.

description: Act like a coach. Guide me with prompts, not answers.
prefill: Act like a coach. Guide me with prompts, not answers.

description: Summarize my intent in your own words before continuing.
prefill: Summarize my intent in your own words before continuing.

description: Reflect back what I just said in 3 bullet points.
prefill: Reflect back what I just said in 3 bullet points.

description: Based on what I told you, what do you think I’m trying to do?
prefill: Based on what I told you, what do you think I’m trying to do?

description: Ask me follow-up questions to clarify, instead of guessing.
prefill: Ask me follow-up questions to clarify, instead of guessing.

description: Can you list 3 different interpretations of what I might mean?
prefill: Can you list 3 different interpretations of what I might mean?

description:
Before you answer, tell me how you’re understanding my
  request.
prefill:
Before you answer, tell me how you’re understanding my
  request.

description: Use clean formatting and keep it copy-paste friendly.
prefill: Use clean formatting and keep it copy-paste friendly.

description: Reply in bullet points unless I say otherwise.
prefill: Reply in bullet points unless I say otherwise.

description:
Structure the output so it’s easy to scan, not read like a
  paragraph.
prefill:
Structure the output so it’s easy to scan, not read like a
  paragraph.

description:
Write this like a professional email / executive summary / doc
  outline.
prefill:
Write this like a professional email / executive summary / doc
  outline.

description: No emojis or fluff — keep it professional.
prefill: No emojis or fluff — keep it professional.

description: Don’t use markdown or special characters. Just raw text.
prefill: Don’t use markdown or special characters. Just raw text.

description:
Use plain language. Assume the reader is smart but
  non-technical.
prefill:
Use plain language. Assume the reader is smart but
  non-technical.

description: Give me 5 different takes before narrowing in on one.
prefill: Give me 5 different takes before narrowing in on one.

description: Don’t rank ideas, just list diverse ones for now.
prefill: Don’t rank ideas, just list diverse ones for now.

description: Go weird. I’ll tell you when to dial it back.
prefill: Go weird. I’ll tell you when to dial it back.

description: Give me both the obvious answer and the counterintuitive one.
prefill: Give me both the obvious answer and the counterintuitive one.

description: Try again, but with a more playful tone.
prefill: Try again, but with a more playful tone.

description: Pitch this like you’re explaining it to a 10-year-old.
prefill: Pitch this like you’re explaining it to a 10-year-old.

description:
Write a Twitter thread that explains [TOPIC] in a simple,
  engaging way.
prefill:
Write a Twitter thread that explains [MARKETING] in a simple,
  engaging way.

description:
Give me 5 blog post ideas that would appeal to someone
  interested in [TOPIC].
prefill:
Give me 5 blog post ideas that would appeal to someone
  interested in [BUSINESS].

description:
Act like a YouTube strategist. Suggest 3 video ideas for a
  channel about [GENERAL].
prefill:
Act like a YouTube strategist. Suggest 3 video ideas for a
  channel about [GENERAL].

description:
Write a short email newsletter section about [FINANCE] with a
  fun hook and CTA.
prefill:
Write a short email newsletter section about [FINANCE] with a
  fun hook and CTA.

description: Outline a 20-minute podcast episode discussing [MARKETING].
prefill: Outline a 20-minute podcast episode discussing [MARKETING].

description:
Give me 3 TikTok hook ideas to grab attention on [MARKETING]
  in the first 5 seconds.
prefill:
Give me 3 TikTok hook ideas to grab attention on [MARKETING]
  in the first 5 seconds.

description:
Explain [BUSINESS] in a way that a smart 10-year-old could
  understand it.
prefill:
Explain [BUSINESS] in a way that a smart 10-year-old could
  understand it.
